query:
query GetLSReportData($organizationId: String!, $teacherId: String!, $isGroupSelected: Boolean, $studentIds: [String!], $limit: Float, $lastSession: Boolean, $lastSessionDates: [String!]!, $subject: Float, $groupIds: [String!], $offset: Float, $assignmentIds: [Float!], $orderBy: String, $additionalGrouping: String!, $lastDate: DateTimeISO!, $prevLevel: Boolean!) {
  getLSReportData(
    organizationId: $organizationId
    id: $teacherId
    isGroupSelected: $isGroupSelected
    studentIds: $studentIds
    limit: $limit
    lastSession: $lastSession
    lastSessionDates: $lastSessionDates
    subject: $subject
    groupIds: $groupIds
    offset: $offset
    assignmentIds: $assignmentIds
    orderBy: $orderBy
    lastDate: $lastDate
    additionalGrouping: $additionalGrouping
    prevLevel: $prevLevel
  ) {
    reportRun
    lsReportResponse {
      totalNoOfRows
      teacherInfo {
        id
        title
        firstName
        lastName
        userName
        __typename
      }
      organizationName
      rows {
        districtId
        firstName
        middleName
        lastName
        userName
        grade
        groupName
        groupId
        assignmentTitle
        personId
        totalCorrect
        totalAttempts
        sessionLength
        assignmentId
        courseType
        ipmStatusId
        sessionHelpCount
        sessionTimeouts
        asmtCompleteStatus
        assignmentUserId
        sessionIpAttempts
        sessionIpCorrect
        exercisesPercentCorrect
        sessionPrerequisiteAttempts
        sessionPrerequisiteCorrect
        prevYearLevel
        currentCourseLevel
        timeSpent
        sessionStartDate
        sessionCompleteDate
        fluencyFlag
        sisUserId
        usageGoalStatus
        isZeroState
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
